data.text: Hi Mr Loathsome!

Don't "Mr" me Pirate!
I want my money by
the end of the day!

Or else you can go sleep
on the street with the rest
of the scum.
Yes Sir! I won't disapoint you!

Types like you always
disappoint me Pirate!

Now, get me those
30 coins you own me!
I'm on my way!
I better get crackin...

Hi pirate. Are you ready to
go on an adventure!?

No, I'm just collecting
those free coins that
are lying around here.
I need to pay my rent.

You know, there is more
to live then paying rent.

Climb my branches,
and discover what it's all about.

I don't know,
Mr Loathsome looked realy angry this time.

Sigh... The are also
coins in the branches.

Why didn't you tell me that earlier
I'm on my way!
Goodmorning little child.
Those where some nice jumps!
Hi, Are you...
Are you God?
Noooo, my child!
I am the man in the sky!

Every year, I bring presents
to the children!
If they are good, that is...
Do you want to have a present?

choice.text:
I'm not a child, but sure,
I like presents!

No time old man, I'm here to
collect the coins..

data.text: Good my child. Choose wisely!
Ow... You can have my coins if you want?
No need for coins in the sky...

A user agreement!
By choosing this, You agree that your data will be used and sold to the highest bidder.
Thanks!

A degree in Economics
not sure you can use that.

Cold hard cash
Very usefull!

A non-disclosure agreement.
How exiting!
Hi Cookie, you won't believe who I just met!
Hi Cookie, want to the striking thing I just got?
Hi Cookie, Want to sign my NDA?
Hi Cookie, I got a new hammer!
Hi Cookie, do you want to check out my new box?
Fuck off man, get lost!
Why are you always so angry?

I don't know?
My mom told me
I was a happy baby.

But then I had to go to
school and stuff.
Now I just want to smash things.

You should try it.
It helps with the pain!
Euhm... Ok!
What's going on Strawberry?

Just got a call from my mum:
My brother got squased by some jerk!
Ow...

Yea, and I really need some money
to buy DRU...
euh, my medicine.
How much do you need?
Just #numCoins coins...

choice.text:
Those are all my coins Strawberry,
I can't do that.

Here you go! #numCoins coins.
I know it's a tough world out there!

data.text: Hi pirate, want to have some fun?
I'm broke Candy. Maybe some other time...
Yea, everyone seems broke these days.

Maybe you can help me get my fingers back?
You being a pirate and such.
Some of my clients really miss them
You know Candy, I'm actually not a real pirate.
Sure, I download a movie every know and then.
But mostly, It's just me trying to pretend I'm free.
I don't even own a sword, or a ship...
ow...
The gnomes down the road sell swords. Maybe they can help?
Ow Candy, I'll see what I can do.
What happend with your fingers anyway?

Mr Loathsome took them.
He says I don't bring in enough money.
... I'm gonna look out for those gnomes Candy!
Wie zijn jullie?
Ik ben corneel
Ik rinus
Ik moet kaka doen
Ik ook
euhm...
in mijn broek
hahahahaaa
hahahaha
hahahaha
Hi Pirate, whats up?

Ow man, feels like the game
is rigged against me.
Whatever I do I feel like I'm loosing

Yea, it's rigged. But that doesn't
mean you can't do anything about it
Even if its something small

And I love beans!
They are my favorite
canned vegetable!
blabla
Can't you read boy! This is a private pier!
I can shoot you right now if I want to

Ow, It's you?
Got my money boy?
Hi God, Want to join the party?

Don't believe in God pirate.
It only gives you false hope...
Nice ship you got there!
Thanks, worked my ass off to get it!
You know, they won't let you get away with this.
I know...
I dont care, it doesn't matter...

Nothing does, thats the point.
Just enjoy the party while it last...
Anyway, I'll see you soon Pirate.
Yea... See you soon God!
